tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I'm honoured to recommend Dr. Thamarai Ram and her clinic which is set the bar very high in patient care and their treatment. In our first consultation she explained the pregnancy in such a manner which was outstanding. In each appointment she always takes the time to explain each step of the pregnancy process, answering I, and educate us. I walk away from each appointment knowing I have all the information I need to make the next best choice in my wife's health care. Each step of the way Dr. Thamarai has displayed genuine care and passion for helping my wife to deliver the baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was in my 12th week when i visited the doctor. I didn't get proper response from my previous two doc due to lockdown and was not able to visit them in person. One day i got bleeding and was very much aftaid and consulted my second doc, she asked me to check for my baby's heartbeat. By God's grace my baby was fine but i was advised by my sonologist to visit my doc immediately where i suffered alot to get a doc to meet. As my second doc was busy with her work. Finally in practo we got Dr.Thamarai who was one of the few doctors who was available at that time and she was near ny house. Finally we went there and got very much satisfied with her consultation. She was very friendly though i was in my 12th week, she listened to me patiently and started from first and gave me good advice. We planned to continue with her til my delivery. Thank you so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr.Thamarai Ram
                 From tha bottom of our hearts, we thank you for the extraordinary care you have given us right from thw start of this precious journey.your patience, kindness, regular contact, generosity of time and care has made the pregnancy and birth the happiest time of our lives.
                  From the moment we found out about L's existence, you have gone above and beyond our expectations. We have felt so honoured to have you looking after us.Every appointment was on time and with plenty of notice. You allayed our fears when we had reduced movement's, you reassured us when we were worried about covid-19 and you made us feel prioritized in every way.
                   On the day of our elective section we had exemplary care from you and from your whole team. Everything was clearly explained and efficiently delivered with minimal pain. We needed only couple of days stay in hospital and are now recovering so well.L is feeding brilliantly. On day3 post-section we went for a walk. M's scar is healing perfectly.
                    We will never forget this incredible, life-changing experience and we will be commending our friends and relatives to you..
                   ..........THANK   YOU........

I felt that I have reached right person on right time, which is more important phase to every girl, and the way staff and nurses appreciable and caring
And thankful to man forever😇

review: I only have great things to say about this doctor,. I was referred for leaking and saw Dr.Thamarai Ram. She was patient in listening to my problem and examined me thoroughly. I felt like she went through all the options and explained the pros and cons of each. In the end I decided to go ahead. I can trampoline with my kids and run without leaking. Dr Thamarai Ram gave me my confidence and my life back as well.s.renuga
